forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West northwest wind 14 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

weather_report:
Afternoon sun blankets Downtown San Francisco with a soothing warmth, the kind that nudges the city from its foggy slumber into a vibrant clarity. As you gaze towards the Golden Gate, you can appreciate the dramatic contrast of cobalt skies against the surrounding landscape. The cool, brisk West wind adds an invigorating snap, rustling through the streets and lifting the spirits of those who wander. Though the forecast hints at a high near 62, the gentle descent to around 60 as the afternoon light wanes towards evening will serve as a reminder to bring along a light jacket.

Tonight, expect the sky to maintain its clarity, the temperature easing into a comfortable embrace at around 52. The wind from the west northwest will continue to dance through the evening, promising a refreshing respite. For those venturing out, a casual yet layered outfit will keep the chill at bay as you stroll through the neighborhood or sip something warm at a sidewalk café. Perhaps an afternoon hike on one of the local trails would be ideal, where the beauty of the surroundings can be savored in the golden light. As dusk deepens, its fading shadows make way for a cozy evening indoors or an engaging night out—whatever your mood beckons as the city glimmers softly under the vast expanse of the clear sky.
